at.ac.tuwien.ims.latex2mobiformulaconv.converter.mathml2html.elements

Interface FormulaElement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Mfenced, Mfrac, Mi, Mn, Mo, Mover, Mroot, Mrow, Ms, Mspace, Mstyle, Msub, Msubsup, Msup, Mtable, Mtd, Mtext, Mtr, Munder, Token

    public interface FormulaElement
    Author:
    Michael Au√ü Created: 20.05.14 23:29

    A part of a formula which can be rendered to HTML

    Note: This is not used when converting to images

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jdom2.Element render(FormulaElement parent, List<FormulaElement> siblings)
      Renders this FormulaElement to HTML.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        org.jdom2.Element render(FormulaElement parent,
                       List<FormulaElement> siblings)
        Renders this FormulaElement to HTML. May call render() on sub-elements for recursive rendering.

        Some cases require to take different actions in rendering depending on this elements parents or siblings.

        Implementing classes SHOULD always have a way to fallback if parent or siblings are NULL

        NEVER call render() on the parent or siblings, endless loop could be the result.

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent FormulaElement
        siblings - list of sibling elements including this FormulaElement
        Returns:
        A JDOM Element which represents this FormulaElement + sub-elements (i.e. in HTML)
